source_text: Royalty 2 comprises $1 per tonne of gold ore mined and processed from specified tenements and a 1.5% net smelter return (NSR) for other minerals.
additional_details: This 1.5% NSR applies to "other minerals" from specified tenements. It is a third-party royalty, payable by Leeuwin Metals (as the acquirer of the project) to an unnamed third party. Leeuwin Metals is currently evaluating whether this obligation remains enforceable.
